about_the_game:
This downloadable content for White Noise 2 allows you to play with Okiku, the Wretched Doll. It also includes a new Idol to use in the game.

Okiku, the Wretched Doll


An old spirit related to death, Okiku inhabits a miserable husk. She watches humans from afar and, once the flame of life burns out, escorts their souls to the afterlife.

Okiku doesn't have an evil nature, as she sees death as a part of the natural cycle of life.

Okiku is a creature whose powers grow during each match, and ends up being an unstoppable hunter.

Purger


This old trunk is able to draw wayward souls, as an offering to the dark ones, to carry out a cleansing ritual.

An old spirit related to death, Okiku inhabits a miserable husk. She watches humans from afar and, once the flame of life burns out, escorts their souls to the afterlife.

Okiku doesn't have an evil nature, as she sees death as a part of the natural cycle of life.

Okiku is a creature whose powers grow during each match, and ends up being an unstoppable hunter.

This old trunk is able to draw wayward souls, as an offering to the dark ones, to carry out a cleansing ritual.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For AMD Graphic cards, MESA drivers newer than 10.1.5 are recommended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: White Noise 2 - Okiku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended but not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This downloadable content for White Noise 2 allows you to play with Okiku, the Wretched Doll Okiku is a creature whose powers grow during each match, and ends up being an unstoppable hunter.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Finnish, Russian, French, German, Portuguese - Portugal, Norwegian, Hungarian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
